document_data.mainbody:
Sprangalars Swordcut, which was also simply called the Swordcut, was a small alley that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Sprangalars Swordcut was located in the southern section of Waterdeeps North Ward. The alley branched south from the Street of the Manticore, connecting with Stabbed Sailor Alley after a short distance.
Sprangalars Swordcut was the site of a bloody confrontation between citizens and the Cult of the Dancing Bear.
* Thorp Villa
